entry.title: FHP-21 (puppy pencil purse)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Pen Cases
Price: 7.00

This adorable Puppy face with flowers pencil purse is handmade from 100% wool, using only soap and warm water. The simple and clean on the front has been carefully needle felted and closes with a zipper fastener to keep any valuables snug and secure.

  • Interior cotton lining
  • Azo free dyes

size: 9.5” X 2” cir
composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor setting
